## Request for Standing Offer (RFSo)
**Digital Radiology Panel System**
**RFSo Number:** PW-23-01021695
**Issue Date:** January 17, 2023
**Closing Date:** February 15, 2023, 14:00 ET

# Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSo) for the supply and delivery of Digital Radiology Panel Systems. The successful bidder will be issued a single standing offer to provide these goods for a period of one year from the date of issuance.

# Description of Goods
The goods required are Digital Radiology Panel Systems. The supplier will be responsible for providing these goods as required during the period of the standing offer, in accordance with the requirements, terms, and conditions outlined in the tender document.

# Basis of Selection
The basis of selection for this RFSo is an evaluation of the technical criteria outlined in the tender document. To be declared responsive, an offer must comply with the requirements of the RFSo and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.

# Evaluation Criteria
The responsive offer with the lowest evaluated price on an aggregate basis will be recommended for issuance of a standing offer.

# Conditions of Purchase
* Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP's procurement team at Megan.McCoy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
* Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Procuring Office: RCMP-GRC
* Contact Information: Megan McCoy, Megan.McCoy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

# Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

# Indigenous Procurement
The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this procurement. For more information and to register, visit the Indigenous Business Directory at: www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory.

# Attachment
The tender documents, including the RFSo, amendments, and supporting documents, can be downloaded from the Canada Buy and Sell website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/ocasions-de-marche
